title: jl-hidecode
description: Configure how JupyterLab Hide Code hides cell inputs.

autoHideTaggedCells.title: Hide tagged cells on open
autoHideTaggedCells.description: If enabled, JupyterLab Hide Code collapses cells that carry the hide tag whenever a notebook loads.

hideTag.title: Hide tag
hideTag.description: Cells that contain this tag will be collapsed when the shortcut or command is executed.
